examples.example: 通过不断努力学习，他顺利通过了中级职称的评定。

translate.english: Through continuous hard study, he successfully passed the assessment of the intermediate professional title.

examples.example: 他经过长时间的准备，成功考取了中级会计师资格证。

translate.english: After a long period of preparation, he successfully obtained the intermediate accountant qualification certificate.

examples.example: 经过中级阶段的磨练，他的能力有了显著提升。

translate.english: After going through the tempering of the intermediate stage, his ability has been significantly improved.
